title: आज तक ने सुशांत सिंह राजपूत के फ़ेक ‘आख़िरी ट्वीट्स’ शेयर किये, बाद में स्टोरी डिलीट कर दी
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: All the tweets from @itsSSR’s Twitter before his death are fake & fabricated – @TwitterIndia has clarified on the same, kindly don’t believe in these tweets and don’t pass it further…Let him please rest in peace! Please, I beg! 🙏🏻 pic.twitter.com/w6pjNEkyFd
